result.title: How I can overcome my fear about math?
result.content:
Hi everybody, hope you are well.Here I want some suggestion about how i can overcome my fear about math. I am very weak in Math. Generally i try to skip any problem or editorial that is related to math. It is very hard to me to understand any Explanation that use a lot of math. When i see any editorial i just try to figure out what happened rather than why happened. After completing reading i think i have got it. But after few time when i ask myself Am I really got it? Then i realize No, I just memorized it. I don't know why i have this tendency to mathematical problems. Of course i didn't have this tendency before. At my early age i loved math very much. I found its ammaizing and interesting. But then there is big gap and now i found that i have fear about it. Can I overcome this fear? Any Suggestion please.

Any web or any book or some interesting/funny problems that will teach me how to think.

Sorry for my bad English.
